meanings.sent1: Before baking the cake, I will presift the flour to remove any lumps.
meanings.sent2: It is important to presift the ingredients before mixing them together.
meanings.sent3: The chef decided to presift the sugar with a big smile on his face.
meanings.sent4: She presifted through the pile of papers, looking for the important document.
meanings.sent5: Presifting the sand through the sieve revealed hidden treasures buried within.

meanings.sent1: I always do a presifting of the flour before starting to bake.
meanings.sent2: The presifting of the ingredients helps in achieving a smooth texture.
meanings.sent3: The presifting of the seeds was a fun activity for the kids in the kitchen.
meanings.sent4: The presifting of information before the meeting saved a lot of time.
meanings.sent5: The presifting of the evidence led to a breakthrough in the case.
